name: Police Driver Car Extreme racing Stunt Simulator
name_original: Police Driver Car Extreme racing Stunt Simulator
description:
Police Driver Car Extreme Stunt Simulator

Police Car Driving Simulator is a new, stunt car driving game, go to extreme speeds and jump off the biggest stunt in super charged
police cars, AVAILABLE NOW, FOR FREE!
Be the best police officer stunt driver in stunt and drift city.
There's no need to use brakes, nitro boost your police sports cars onto so many of unique stunts and tricks to perform the world's most amazing stunts.
you'll get to experience realistic car damage by hitting into obstacles and crashing cars to see full body damage.
In Police Car Driving Simulator, do the biggest jumps, fastest drifts, and accelerate to blistering top speeds to do difficult stunts like the loop de loop!
Play the most addictive physics-based free car racing game driving simulator.

key features:
Beautiful 3D graphics
Extreme precision driving simulator
Entertaining gameplay
Authentic police car lights and sounds
